channel.title: ABOG Podcast
channel.description: ABOG Podcast is a casual conversation about music. Includes songs from the best local and independent artists. Side B video games.
channel.itunes:author: Joel Sherfinski
channel.itunes:summary: ABOG Podcast is a casual conversation about music. Includes songs from the best local and independent artists. Side B video games.

item.title: Episode 46: Jeff Lynne's 100 Billionth #1
item.description:
Subscribe

Joel could take a hint from Shane's mastery of the whole body cleansing thing in order to gain  more coffee and guitar time. Great music, impressions of Gaslight Anthem's Get Hurt album and side B content that goes off the rails in a new episode of ABOG Podcast.

Ice Breaker- How long does it take you to get ready in the morning?

Music (0:07:00)

News- Highest selling vinyl for first time in over 20 years, Paul McCartney scores video game soundtrack and is set to release an upcoming single in support of, Tom Petty finally has a #1 record after 37 years of hits, Jeff Lynne professional glommer, authorized Nick Drake biography, Foo Fighters preorder vinyl offerings with varying album cover choices

Listening To- Rob Zombie (Hellbilly Deluxe) via Enjoy the Ride Records, Gaslight Anthem (Get Hurt), .357 String Band, Joseph Huber (The Hanging Road), The Good Luck Thrift Store Outlet, Phox live at Turner Hall in Milwaukee (video), This Wild Life vinyl, Rodrigo y Gabriela (9 Dead Alive)

All music played with permission

  • Direct Hit!- Buried Alive (Brainless God) // Website // Facebook
  • Rapids- Voyage of the Damned (Traction EP) // Bandcamp // Facebook // Twitter
  • Joseph Huber- Coming Down from You (The Hanging Road) // Website // Facebook // Twitter
  • Boston Manor- All Tight (Euan Cosh) (Victimised EP) // Bandcamp // Facebook

Website // Podcast // Facebook // Twitter: ABOG, Joel, Shane // Spotify // Please rate or review ABOG Podcast on iTunes

 

Side B (1:10:40)

Video Games- Last of Us: Remastered (PS4), Ultra Street Fighter 4 (PS3), Surgeon Simulator (PS4), FIFA 14 (PS4), Mario Golf World Tour (3DS), Super Mario Land 3D (3DS), Nano Assault EX (3DS), Road Not Taken (PS4), Remastered games almost better than nothing

item.title: Episode 45: A Band of Covers
item.description:
Subscribe

Joel and Shane buy new guitars and can't help but talk about them in Side B but only after they cover a few covers in Side A. Beers, music conversation and a generous mix of great songs round out the episode.

Ice Breaker- What was your first job?

Music (0:07:15)

News- RIP Johnny Winter, Singing contests are not what music is about, new Foo Fighters is finished, blur to release Live at Budokan on 8/11, King of covers, Weird Al has the first No 1 comedy record in over 50 years, Primus Willy Wonka and the Chocolate Factory

Listening To- Joey Cape/Tony Sly, Pennywise (Straight Ahead), Rise Against (The Black Market), Band of Horses (Cease To Begin), Jack White live in Milwaukee (article from Milwaukee Record), Jack White hates the Cubs?, Beck (Song Reader)

All music played with permission

  • Field Report- Wings (Marigolden) // Website // Facebook // Twitter
  • Uke-Hunt- Rainy Days and Mondays (Uke-Hunt) // Fat Wreck Chords
  • Paper Holland- Still In Bed (Happy Belated) // Bandcamp // Facebook // Twitter // YouTube
  • Sunday Punk Club- Trust Me (Victimised EP) // Bandcamp // Facebook

Direct Download // Website // Podcast // Facebook // Twitter: ABOG, Joel, Shane // Spotify // Leave us some stars or a review on iTunes

 

Side B (1:01:45)

Video Games- Lego Marvel Super Heroes (PS4), Battlefield 4 new maps (PS4), The Last of Us: Remastered (PS4), Pixel Junk Shooter Ultimate (PS4), Mario Golf: World Tour (3DS)

Guitars- Joel and Shane buy new guitars and talk about them, Union Jack Sheraton, American Standard USA Telecaster, upcoming gig

item.title: Episode 44: Three's Company Pedal
item.description:
Subscribe

Ever get together with friends, talk music and spin records? Joel and Shane do exactly that in another episode of the ABOG Podcast.

Ice Breaker- What is your favorite 80's TV show?

Music (0:06:35)

News- Pink Floyd releasing a new album, Best selling album of the last 25 years, No new Tool album, RIP Tommy Ramone, Ramones recollections, Coheed and Cambria's gesture to a fan in need, Beck's Song Reader coming in audio form

Listening To- Ramones (The Last Show), Uke-Hunt (Uke-Hunt), Death From Above 1979 (You're a Woman, I'm a Machine), White Stripes/Jack White

All music played with permission

  • Phox- Shrinking Violets (Phox) // Website // Facebook // Twitter
  • The Delta Routine- Cigarettes and Caffeine Nightmares (Cigarettes and Caffeine Nightmares) // Website // Facebook // Twitter
  • Kentucky Knife Fight- Bad Blood (Hush Hush) // Website // Facebook // Twitter
  • Lost in a Name- Poison (The Chorus Gives Us Reason) // Preorder New Album // YouTube // Twitter
  • Boy & Bear- Southern Sun (Harlequin Dream) // Website // Facebook // Twitter

Website // Podcast // Facebook // Twitter: ABOG, Joel, Shane // Spotify // Leave us some stars or a review on iTunes

 

Side B (1:12:50)

Video Games- Pixel Junk Shooter Ultimate (PS4/Vita), Killzone Shadow Fall (PS4), Mario Golf: World Tour

item.title: Episode 43: Poppycock
item.description:
Subscribe

The guys put on sunscreen before sharing a summertime mix and favoriting a few snacks. Great tunes in the hot sun and a potential visit from the potentially real Paul McCartney highlight a new episode of audio from ABOG Podcast. // Special guest Mike from AddedXP

Ice Breaker- What is your favorite snack food?

Music (0:01:30)

New Releases- White Lung (Deep Fantasy), Phox (Phox), Mastodon (Once More 'Round The Sun), Eric Johnson (Europe Live)

News- Paul McCartney is alive but is it really him? Billy Talbot suffers a stroke, final tours, concert and venue preferences

Listening To- This Wild Life (Clouded), Jack White (Lazaretto), Sylvan Esso live at 88.9 Radio Milwaukee, Hip Hop records, Outkast live at Summerfest, Volcano Choir (repave), The Get Up Kids (On A Wire), Summertime music and mixes, Lorde (Pure Heroine), Bob Mould/Husker Du/Sugar, Morningwood, The Pixes (Indie Cindy), Mike Doughty, The Format (Interventions and Lullabies), Phantogram, The HandGrenades (52)

Listener Email- podcast@abandofgamers.com

All music played with permission

  • White Lung- Glue // Website // Bandcamp
  • The Delegators- Be Good To Me // Website // Bandcamp // Twitter
  • This Wild Life- Bound To Break // Website // Twitter
  • The HandGrenades- A Heart Like Yours // Bandcamp // Facebook

Website // Podcast // Facebook // Twitter: ABOG, Joel, Shane, Guest Mike, AddedXP // Leave us some stars or a review on iTunes

 

Side B (1:23:45)

Video Games- Red Dead Redemption save file lost, Portal 2, Dragon Hunter: Alliance (Vita), Terraria (Vita), God of War Collection (Vita), Mercenary Kings (PS4), Mass Effect Trilogy (PS3), 10,000,000 (Mobile), Dots (Mobile), Pokemon Emerald, Infamous: Second Son (PS4), MLB 14: The Show (PS4), FIFA 14 (PS4), NHL 15, next Madden online league, good and bad sports, Far Cry 3 (PS3)

item.title: Episode 42: Kill The Singer
item.description:
Subscribe

A good friend joins Joel and Shane this week and together they build a wall of guitars.

Ice Breaker (0:01:25)

Music (0:06:10)

Vince Clore, special guest, talks about Psychomania, The Gleasons and his new gig in the music industry.

New Releases- Jack White (Lazaretto), The Delphines (Hush), Rival Sons (Great Western Valkyrie), Bob Mould (Beauty & Ruin)

News- Paul McCartney's birthday party not on tour, Casey Casem passes away, The Gaslight Anthem's new record Get Hurt out this August

Listening To- Prong (Ruining Lives), The Hold Steady (Teeth Dreams), Sevendust (Time Travelers & Bonfires), Lagwagon (Hoss), Screeching Weasel, Riverdales, Parquet Courts (Sunbathing Animal), Amazon music service, YouTube, Sylvan Esso (Sylvan Esso)

All music played with permission

  • Psychomania- Howling
  • The Delphines- Eat You Alive // Bandcamp // Facebook // Twitter
  • Antler House- On The Rocks // Delaware House Records // Bandcamp // Facebook
  • Sylvan Esso- Dreamy Bruises // Website // Facebook // Twitter

Video Games (1:12:40)

Now Playing- Battlefield 4 Vs. Gamer Chatter follow up and shout outs, MLB 14: The Show (PS4), Tomb Raider (PS3), Grand Theft Auto V (PS3), Mario Kart 8, Wii U data transfer, Peggle 2 (XBOX One), Lego Marvel Super Heroes (XBOX One), Dead Rising 3 (XBOX One)

Topics- E3 impressions

Website // Podcast // Twitter: ABOG, Joel, Shane, Vince

item.title: Episode 41: How The Ginch Stole The Podcast
item.description:
Subscribe

Shane sitting around in his ginch? A Canadian specific underwear reference and lots of great music make for another entertaining episode.

Ice Breaker (0:01:12)

Music (0:05:05)

New Releases- The Orwells (Disgraceland), Sharon Van Etten (Are We There), The Wild Life (Clouded), Led Zeppelin Reissues

News- Beastie Boys honoring MCA's wishes and take it to court, Jack White Vs. The Black Keys, Metallica's warm welcome to Glastonbury, GWARbar

Listening To- John Frusciante (Curtains), Radiohead (The Bends), American Football, The American Analog Set, The Jazz June, Sirius/XM, Music tech in new vehicles

All music shared with kind permission

  • The Orwells- Who Needs You // Website // Twitter
  • The Gleasons- Let It Go // iTunes // Facebook
  • The Oh Wells- Tightrope // Website // Twitter
  • Call Me Lightning- Called To The Throne // Bandcamp // Facebook

Video Games (1:03:42)

Now Playing- Doctor Who: The Eternity Clock (Vita), Gran Turismo 6 (PS3), Tomb Raider (PS3), RBI Baseball 14 (PS3), Wii U Nintendo ID and Club Nintendo, Mario Kart 8

Topics- E3 is next week, Battlefield 4 (PS4) Vs. Gamer Chatter on Saturday 6/7/14 2pm EST

Website // Podcast // Twitter: ABOG, Joel, Shane

item.title: Episode 40: Ultra Means Toy
item.description:
Subscribe

The podcast format is solidified. Just choose which groove you put the needle in for either music or video games.

Ice Breaker (0:01:20)

Music (0:05:00)

New Releases- Oasis (Definitely Maybe/Remastered), The Black Keys (Turn Blue), Tori Amos (Unrepentent Geraldines), Space Raft (S/T), The Roots (...and then you shoot your cousin), Coldplay

News- Apple reportedly buying Beats, Dave Grohl's HBO TV show, Compact discs are wearing out, Casey Casem

Listening To- Me First and the Gimmie Gimmies (Are We Not Men? We Are Diva), Jack White (Blunderbuss), Red Hot Chili Peppers (Californication), Neil Young (A Letter Home), The GOASTT (Midnight Sun), Truckfighters (Universe)

All music shared on the podcast with kind permission from the artists.

  • Dogs In Ecstacy- I'm A Man // Bandcamp // Twitter
  • Needles//Pins- I Heart Your Drugs // Website // Bandcamp // Twitter
  • Space Raft- We're Not Alone // Dusty Medical Records // Facebook
  • Whips- Witch // Bandcamp

Video Games (1:04:10)

Now Playing- MLB 14: The Show (PS4), Gran Turismo 6 (PS3), Walking Dead (Vita), Borderlands 2 (PS3), All Pro Football 2K8 (PS3), Trials Fusion (PS4), Ryse (XBOX One)

Topics- In a gaming rutt, E3 2014 about hedging bets, Canada's prices, XBOX One without Kinect

House Cleaning (1:37:50)

item.title: Episode 39: Flipped
item.description:
Sides are flipped and the show starts with music this episode. Shane and Joel talk a lot of music and explain why Nintendo's Betamax decision may have buried them ET style.

 

Icebreaker : What's more important to your future - stability or excitement?

 

Music (0:03:55)

  • News

    • 185TB Cassette Tapevia Forbes

  • Midwest Death Rattle- Me and My Molotov

  • New Releases/Discoveries

    • Damon Albarn (Everyday Robots), Me First (Are We Not Men We Are Diva), The Ghost Of A Saber Tooth Tiger (La Carotte Bleue), The Nels Cline Singers (Macroscope), Rodrigo y Gabriela (9 Dead Alive), Chevelle (La Gargola), Ocean Colour Scene (Moseley Shoals), Ben Harper (Childhood Home), The Black Keys (Turn Blue)

  • Vic and Gab- Let You Down (Love Of Mine)

  • Now Spinning

    • Damon Albarn (Everyday Robots), Van Halen (Van Halen II), Green Day (Demolicious), Jack Johnson (Live At Third Man), Al Di Meola, Them Crooked Vultures (Them Crooked Vultures), Queens of The Stone Age (...Like Clockwork), Albert Hammond Jr. (AHJ)

  • Wild Ones- Golden Twin (Keep It Safe)

 

Video Games (1:02:00)

  • Infamous: Second Son (PS4), Octodad: Dadliest Catch (PS4), Battlefield 4 (PS4), Trials Fusion (PS4), Madden 25 Online League (PS3)

 

Website,Podcast,Forums (Retroids),@ABandofGamers, @FivespotJoel, @Skippynixx, iTunes, Stitcher,Facebook,Google Plus, Spotify (ABOG Podcast Music)

Subscribe to Podcast Feed

item.title: Episode 38: Tunes To Change Momentum
item.description:
Pinball Wizards this episode Joel and Shane hit up the flippers and then talk lots of music including Record Store Day 2014 experiences and purchases.

Icebreaker : Would you work if you didn't need the money?

Video Games (0:04:11)

  • Muscle memory and Killzone 3 (PS3), Trials Fusion (PS4) in depth, PlayStation Home is not a game, Video game selfies, Midwest Gaming Classic 2014 happenings, Actual pinball is superior to digital pinball (duh), Bend over and look up- it's pinball, Drinking gross Chicago booze, Importance of hand sanitizer, Forza 5 (XBOX One), Elevator Action (NES)

Music (0:55:30)

  • Bombino- Amidinine (Nomad), Record Store Day experience and purchases (The Exclusive Company, Acme Records, Rush Mor Records, Avalon Records), Buying concert tickets, Milwaukee's Summerfest 2014 Line Up, Shane explains how the Third Man vault package works, The World's fastest record, Ebay flippers invade Record Store Day, Man thoughts and music, Travis- Moving (Where You Stand)

ABOG Website, Forums (Retroids), @ABandofGamers, @FivespotJoel, @Skippynixx, iTunes, Stitcher, Facebook, Google Plus, Spotify (ABOG Podcast Music)

Subscribe to Podcast Feed

item.title: Episode 37: Pool Noodles
item.description:
Three is a magic number this episode as a special guest joins Joel and Shane and all three hit up the usual content laughing their way through.

Icebreaker : If you could travel anywhere in the world tomorrow, where would you go first?

Side A : Video Games (0:06:55)

  • Tomb Raider (PS3), Devil May Cry (PS3), Zen Pinball 2 (PS3/Vita), Borderlands 2 (PS3), Child purchases on a new PlayStation Vita, Shane's Battlefield 4 exploits, It's not really lag, Infamous: Second Son (PS4), Fear of video game heights, Joe Danger 2 The Movie (PS3), Killer Instinct (XBOX One)

Side B : Music (0:50:18)

  • Bad Suns- Cardiac Arrest (Transpose), Amazon music deals, Typhoon at Turner Hall on 4/2 with Lady Lamb the Beekeeper and Wild Ones, Joel learns the ukulele, Valerie June brings another to tears, Music for Shane's boss, Nirvana (In Utero), Nirvana (MTV Unplugged), The Sounds (Crossing The Rubicon), Gaslight Anthem (Handwritten), Growers, NOFX- Pharmacist's Daughter (Pump Up the Valuum), Alphabetic Shuffling, Seattle Spring in Wisconsin, Led Zeppelin, Blind Melon (Nico), Abandon Jalopy- The Wolf, Porcupine Tree

Shane channels Spud from Trainspotting and reads an email (podcast@abandofgamers.com)

ABOG Website, Forums (Retroids), @ABandofGamers, @FivespotJoel, @Skippynixx, iTunes, Stitcher, Facebook, Google Plus, Spotify (side B content)

Links from Damon's email : Amazon's Free Artists of the Month, Free Songs, Good Fight Free Music Sampler

Subscribe to Podcast Feed

item.title: Episode 36: Country Music Podcasting Legends
item.description:
After fattening up on fast food, the boys settle in with the usual formula. Infamous: Second Son takes over the video game segment but doesn't outdo some amazing music on Side B.

Icebreaker : Favorite Fast Food

Side A : Video Games (0:06:30)

  • Upgrading PlayStation Vita Memory Card, 64gb Imported From Play-Asia, Real Boxing (Vita), Rayman Legends (PS4), Joe Danger 2: The Movie, Ryse Son Of Rome (XBOX One), Infamous: Second Son (PS4), Midwest Gaming Classic 4/12-4/13 Plans

Side B : Music (1:02:30)

  • Midnight Reruns- King of Pop (Midnight Reruns), Dirty Pretty Things- Buzzards and Crows (Romance At Short Notice), Johnny Cash (Out Among The Stars), Typhoon- Artificial Light (White Lighter)

Email: podcast@abandofgamers.com

Website, Forums (Retroids), @ABandofGamers, @FivespotJoel, @Skippynixx, iTunes, Stitcher, Facebook, Google Plus, YouTube, tumblr, Spotify (side B content)

Subscribe to Podcast Feed

item.title: Episode 35: Rears In Gear
item.description:
Rears in seats tempo up to rears in gear. Break it down. 

Icebreaker : How Did You Decide To Go Into Your Field?

Side A : Video Games (0:05:30)

  • South Park: The Stick of Truth (PS3), Madden Online League (PS3), Zen Pinball 2 (PS3), Score Chasing at MGC, XBOX One, Barking At Kinect 2.0, Plants Vs Zombies: Garden Warfare (XBOX One), Titanfall (XBOX One)

Side B : Music (1:03:05)

  • Sharon Jones And The Dap Kings- Stranger to My Happiness (Give The People What They Want) And Valerie June Live At Pabst Theater on 3/6, Record Store Day Release List, Third Man Records, The Sword Live At The Rave 3/8, Freelance Whales, Floating Compass- Travel (Tales From Yesteryear) Soundcloud Link

item.title: Episode 34: Grooves And Moods
item.description:
A sandwich is made and the candles are lit. Joel and Shane know how to set a proper mood and it carries through the entire episode.

Icebreaker : Favorite Food

Side A : Video Games (0:03:45)

  • Console Wars viewed and renewed, XBOX One Titanfall bundle and UK price drop, Basement Crawl (PS4), Battlefield 4 (PS4), Killzone Sunday nights, a mood dims The Last of Us, Zen Pinball 2 (PS3), Plants Vs. Zombies (PS3 & Vita), Borderlands 2 co-op (PS3), MGC, new T-shirts

Side B : Music (1:09:40)

  • Beck- Blue Moon (Morning Phase), Bad Religion- Sorrow Acoustic Version (New Maps of Hell), Milwaukee Public Museum's Food and Froth Event, Band of Horses- No One's Gonna Love You (Acoustic At The Ryman)

Email: podcast@abandofgamers.com

Website, Forums (Retroids), @ABandofGamers, @FivespotJoel, @Skippynixx, iTunes, Stitcher, Facebook, Google Plus, tumblr

item.title: Episode 33: Walk Twenty Feet And Die Three
item.description:
Joel and Shane take a road trip to the Super Bowl halftime show but forget to plug in their microphones. Somehow they still end up with a full episode of audio based on their knowledge and understanding of the mighty air guitar.

Icebreaker : Longest Road Trip

Side A : Video Games (0:04:15)

  • News from the PlayStation Event, PlayStation Vita, Borderlands 2 (Vita), Evolve, Battlefield 4 (PS4), Outlast (PS4), The Last of Us (PS3), Journey (PS3), Strat Guides, Madden 25 Online League, Community Multiplayer Happenings

Side B : Music (0:44:44)

  • Red Hot Chili Peppers- This Velvet Glove (Californication), Super Bowl Halftime Show, Flea's Blog Post, Luscious Jackson- So Rock On (Magic Hour), The Distillers- Hall of Mirrors (Coral Fang), Les Claypool’s Duo De Twang- Stayin’ Alive (Four Foot Shack), De La Soul- Me Myself and I (3 Feet High and Rising), AddedXP

Email: podcast@abandofgamers.com

Website, Forums (Retroids), @ABandofGamers, @FivespotJoel, @Skippynixx, iTunes, Stitcher, Facebook, Google Plus, tumblr

item.description:

item.title: Episode 29: All The Tweaking Of All Your Parts Is There
item.description:
Video Games (0:00:00 - 1:00:29)

  • Need for Speed Rivals (PS4), Gran Turismo 6 (PS3), Battlefield 4 (PS4), Upgraded PS4 HDD to a 1TB, Resogun (PS4), Tilt to Live 2: Redonkulous (iOS universal app), Atari Flashback 3, The Legend of Zelda A Link Between Worlds (3DS), Super Mario 3D World (Wii U), Animal Crossing’s abusive animals (3DS)

and Music (1:00:30 - 1:43:51)

item.title: Episode 28: Super Record Store 3D World A Link to the Past
item.description:
Video Games

  • Need for Speed Rivals (PS4), Spelunky (Vita), Monopoly Slots (iOS), The Legend of Zelda A Link Between Worlds (3DS), Super Mario 3D World (Wii U), our favorite Super Mario games of all-time, Resogun (PS4) share feature for high score tips

and Music

  • Record Store Day buys (Joel) include Queens of the Stone Age- Like Clockwork and Arcade Fire- Reflektor
  • Shane prepares for a Pearl Jam concert
  • Bad Religion believes

Listener E-mail (podcast@abandofgamers.com)

  • Pairing music/gaming like wine/food
  • email your Favorite of the Year (game and/or album) by end of 2012

www.abandofgamers.com, @ABandofGamers, @FivespotJoel, @Skippynixx, iTunes, Stitcher, Facebook and Google Plus

item.title: Episode 26: Beer, Fear, Thank You
item.description:
It's Halloween so why not darken the mood with heavier music and horror movie tones. Otherwise it's business as usual with video game talk first and then a music segment thereafter.

Video Games

  • GTA V, Red Dead Redemption, The Walking Dead, Madden 25, Diablo III, Spelunky

and Music

Listener E-mail (send to podcast@abandofgamers.com)

item.title: Episode 25: Price of Coffee
item.description:
Shane officially joins as ABOG's new cohost and starts this episode off strong with lots of video game discussion. In the second section (music segment), the hosts share all the records they're currently spinning and then discuss some polarizing artists. Plenty of music shared throughout.

Gaming

  • Grand Theft Auto V, Pinball Arcade, Animal Crossing New Leaf, Liberation Maiden, Hustle Kings, Madden 25 Online League, Castle of Illusion, NBA 2K14

and Music

  • Pickwick- Window Sill, Alice Donut- Lady Di, The Real McKenzies- Pour Decisions, Gaslight Anthem- National Anthem

Podcast was recorded and mixed live, contains no edits and was released immediately upon completion.

Website, Retroids (our forums), Twitter @ABandofGamers, @FivespotJoel, @Skippynixx, Facebook, Google+, Rate and review us on iTunes and Stitcher

item.title: Episode 24: Mixtape
item.description:
Joel and Shane talk their latest gaming exploits and then celebrate 50 years of the cassette tape. They focus on the mixtape and of course share some mixtape classics throughout.

Gaming

  • PS3 super slim console upgrade, Resident Evil 6, GTA V, Diablo 3, Dead Trigger, Super Mario Land 3D, Nano Assault EX, ESPN app on XBOX 360

and Music

  • Volcano Choir- Byegone, R.L. Burnside- Come On In (Live), MU330- Spilled My Drink, Del Tha Funkee Homosapien- Mistadobalina

Podcast was recorded and mixed live, contains no edits and was released immediately upon completion.

item.title: Episode 21: No Mush With Extra Croutons
item.description: In this episode Trickman Terry Minnich joins Joel and entertains with a few EGM (Electronic Gaming Monthly) memories and a stroll through his personal arcade. They then fast forward to future consoles and the latest news from Microsoft regarding the removal of DRM from XBOX One. Playing Ouya, Nintendo 3DS and Animal Crossing.

item.title: Episode 20: Ugly Babies At E3
item.description: AddedXP guest host and join Joel in a lengthy E3 discussion including predictions and a family reunion. Before that Joel rationalizes a new PS3 purchase. Playing MLB 13: The Show (Vita), Untold Legends: Brotherhood of the Blade (PSP/Vita), Spec Ops: The Line, Grid 2 and talking about many more.

item.title: Episode 19 : Lovely Day
item.description: After a waterlogged weekend, Bill attacks his gaming backlog by finishing up Halo 4, Bioshock Infinite, and Resistance 3 before curb-stomping the zombie horde in Dead Island Riptide with fellow ABOG community members. Joel provides an entertaining and emotional fireside tale, platforms his way through Mighty Switch Force, and gives his Vita some love with the help of those adorable Mutant Blobs.

item.title: Episode 18 : The Army of Remakes
item.description:
Joel and Bill support each other through the responsibilities of life and look forward to a break from reality during this brief episode of A Band of Gamers.

Bill returns to the tropics, manages infinite backtracking, and shares his love for horror in cinema. Joel troubleshoots his PS3, recalls fond memories of classic gaming, and observes the joy of score chasing.

item.title: Episode 17 : Super Brick House
item.description: Bill dreams of living in a city built from Legos, finds paradise among the clouds, and provides a shot of testosterone to his man-cave. Joel gets some hands-on time with Nintendo's latest, dukes it out with the most lethal bounty hunter in the universe, and gets his acoustical groove back.

item.title: Episode 16 : MGC Live
item.description: Recorded live at the Midwest Gaming Classic 2013. Guests include Scott Sauer (Gamers Only Older), Jeff Ross (Rman5k from AddedXP), Eric Baily and Eric Hunter (1 More Podcastle) in addition to a couple community members.
item.itunes:subtitle: Recorded live at the Midwest Gaming Classic 2013. Guests include Scott Sauer (Gamers Only Older), Jeff Ross (Rman5k from AddedXP), Eric Baily and Eric Hunter (1 More Podcastle) in addition to a couple community members.

item.title: Episode 15 : Full On Funk
item.description: Bill enjoys his chicken hardboiled, reaps the benefits of a classic bank heist, and falls in love with an iconic video game legend. Joel celebrates Shmup appreciation month, treats his jungle fever, and empties his wallet to Zen Pinball.
item.itunes:subtitle: Bill enjoys his chicken hardboiled, reaps the benefits of a classic bank heist, and falls in love with an iconic video game legend. Joel celebrates Shmup appreciation month, treats his jungle fever, and empties his wallet to Zen Pinball.

item.title: Episode 14 : Cold Steak
item.description: Scott Sauer from Gamers Only Older joins Bill and Joel to talk about his biggest gaming accomplishment, the genius that is Coheed & Cambria, and provides details about the upcoming Days of Goo. Joel embraces his score-chasing addiction and realizes the benefits of tablet gaming, while Bill has a soapbox moment and finally gets his hands on Sly Cooper for the Vita.
item.itunes:subtitle: Scott Sauer from Gamers Only Older joins Bill and Joel to talk about his biggest gaming accomplishment, the genius that is Coheed & Cambria, and provides details about the upcoming Days of Goo. Joel embraces his score-chasing addiction and...

item.title: Episode 13 : And Whatever Rhymes With Eloquent
item.description: Bill embraces human mutations, discovers another WiiU game, and grabs two tickets to paradise. Joel makes an early game-of-the-year prediction, cuts the ribbon on ABOG's latest endeavor, and announces his intentions for a 3-way.
item.itunes:subtitle: Bill embraces human mutations, discovers another WiiU game, and grabs two tickets to paradise. Joel makes an early game-of-the-year prediction, cuts the ribbon on ABOG's latest endeavor, and announces his intentions for a 3-way.

item.title: Episode 12 : Slow Priests
item.description: You'll get more than you bargained for this time around. Bill betrays his family, exploits his son's fears and has a mild Segasm, while Joel tastes brawler defeat, exhibits signs of a DmC stroke and cuts the proverbial cord. Things get weird as shit after talking about the Midwest Gaming Classic and we both struggle with saying our goodbyes.

item.description: In this episode Bill reviews LEGO The Lord of the Rings and Far Cry 3. The hosts also share recent gaming exploits, an open invitation to join a Dead Space backlog support group and the latest community reviews.
